clauses.title: You are not being tracked
clauses.description: The document excerpt needs to include the words "[the service] does not track [users]" or "[the service] does not use any tracking technology".
clauses.clause_text: We do not track anything in cookies.

case.text: You are not being tracked

clauses.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
clauses.description: Your Personal Data is only used for the essential purposes of the Service, which are clearly defined on the Agreements. For instance, the Service won't abuse your data to deliver targeted advertisements to you or for marketing purposes.
clauses.clause_text: We do not provide information on your actions to any outside party or track you for the purpose of advertising.

case.text: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

clauses.title: You can delete your content from this service
clauses.description: You can ask the service to remove your content at any time, and it's deleted within a reasonable time.
clauses.clause_text: you have the ability to delete all content before you do so.

case.text: You can delete your content from this service

clauses.title: You maintain ownership of your content
clauses.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.
clauses.clause_text: You own all of the content and information you post on Brax.Me

case.text: You maintain ownership of your content

clauses.title: Your personal data is not shared with third parties
clauses.description: Information collected from users by this service is not given to third parties.
clauses.clause_text:
We do not share your information unless required
to do so by US law.

case.text: Your personal data is not shared with third parties

clauses.title: User-generated content is encrypted, and this service cannot decrypt it
clauses.description: Content generated by the users is end-to-end encrypted, in a way that it can't be accessed by anyone unauthorised, and even the service has no technical means to decrypt it.
clauses.clause_text:
Encryption

All content is kept in an encrypted form both in storage and in transport.

case.text: User-generated content is encrypted, and this service cannot decrypt it

clauses.title: Your personal data will not be used for an automated decision-making
clauses.description: The service promises not to use your personal data for automated decision-making, including profiling.
clauses.clause_text: There are no "profiles" on you.

case.text: Your personal data will not be used for an automated decision-making

clauses.title: Details are provided about what kind of information they collect
clauses.description: The Privacy Policy describes in detail the data collected through the website and through the services provided.
clauses.clause_text: What information do we collect?

case.text: Information is provided about what kind of information they collect

clauses.title: This service does not collect, use, or share location data
clauses.description: No location-based information is tracked by the service, so that it cannot be used or shared with third parties.
clauses.clause_text: We do not track your location

case.text: This service does not collect, use, or share location data

clauses.title: Your personal data is not sold
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.
clauses.clause_text: We do not sell, exchange, or transfer your email address, or SMS number to other companies without your express permission.

case.text: Your personal data is not sold

clauses.title: Pseudonyms are allowed
clauses.description: You don't need to provide your full name to use the Service and you are allowed to use a pseudonym instead.
clauses.clause_text:
During signup, we collect your name.
It is not required that you give your real name, however it may be difficult for you to be identified by your friends if you don't provide it.
You can always change this at any time.

case.text: Pseudonyms are allowed

clauses.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the California Consumer Privacy Act.
clauses.clause_text: Because we value your privacy we have taken the necessary precautions to be in compliance with the California Online Privacy Protection Act.

case.text: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users

clauses.title: You have the right to leave this service at any time
clauses.description: You can stop using the service and/or cancel or delete your account at any time for any reason. Moreover, the termination is reasonably fast and simple.
clauses.clause_text: You may choose to terminate this service at any time

case.text: You have the right to leave this service at any time

clauses.title: Information is provided about security practices
clauses.description: It's important to know what security measures are taken to protect your data from unauthorized access. This case applies to the Agreements that precisely explain their security practices.
clauses.clause_text:
We do not store your password directly (we use something called an irreversible hash).
This means that we cannot see your password or log in to your account without your knowledge.

case.text: Information is provided about security practices

clauses.title: You can choose with whom you share content
clauses.description: Users can decide whether or not they want their content to be shared and they can control how and with whom it is shared.
clauses.clause_text: you can control how it is shared through your privacy and application settings.

case.text: You can choose with whom you share content

clauses.title: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.
clauses.description: Users can't use the Service for commercial purposes (unless the Service consents): it is only for personal, individual purposes.
clauses.clause_text: Use of this service is FREE for non-commercial use and for personal storage use under 4GB, and file sharing download bandwidth under 4GB.

case.text: This service is only available for use individually and non-commercially.

clauses.title: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.
clauses.clause_text: You will not post unauthorized commercial communications (such as spam).

case.text: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages

clauses.title: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed
clauses.clause_text: You will not collect users' content or information, or otherwise access Brax.Me, using automated means (such as harvesting bots, robots, spiders, or scrapers) without our prior permission

case.text: Spidering, crawling, or accessing the site through any automated means is not allowed

clauses.title: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content
clauses.description: This service prohibits users from submitting content of a variety of types. This can include content that is unlawful, harassing, abusive, threatening, libelous, sexist, racist, homophobic, transphobic, or discriminatory in any other way.
clauses.clause_text: Public (discoverable and searchable) viewable content or materials of any kind (text, graphics, images, photographs, sounds, etc.) that in our reasonable judgment may be found objectionable or inappropriate, for example, materials that may be considered obscene, pornographic, or defamatory will be removed from public access.

case.text: You agree not to submit libelous, harassing or threatening content

clauses.title: Your account can be suspended for several reasons
clauses.clause_text: Users who create inappropriate content in publicly discoverable areas are subject to having their account inactivated, disabled, or have parts of their content partially or totally deleted in publicly visible areas.

case.text: Your account can be suspended for several reasons

clauses.title: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to post any content of pornographic nature. This includes adult content, things that are sexually explicit, or obscene.
clauses.clause_text:
Public (discoverable and searchable) viewable content or materials of any kind (text, graphics,
images, photographs, sounds, etc.) that in our reasonable judgment may be found objectionable or
inappropriate, for example, materials that may be considered obscene, pornographic, or defamatory will be
removed from public access.

case.text: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over 13 years of age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.
clauses.clause_text: You must be at least 13 years old to use this service.

case.text: This service is only available to users over a certain age

clauses.title: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes
clauses.description: The user agrees not to commit any unlawful acts through the use of the website, including the posting of illegal content or messaging.
clauses.clause_text: You will not use Brax.Me to do anything unlawful

case.text: You agree not to use the service for illegal purposes

clauses.title: Third parties are involved in operating the service (Amazon Web Services Hosting)
clauses.clause_text: Brax.Me is built on the Amazon Web Services (AWS) platform.

case.text: Third parties are involved in operating the service
